participant_2.background:
I think it's cool that I'm able to serve my country and protect my family.
i am allergic to dust.
my family owns a farm.
i went to college and graduated few years ago.
I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors.

content.text: I am doing good, thank you! How about you?
I am doing well! What do you do for a living?
I am a soldier in the army.
That's cool! I don't know much about the military, but I have heard it can be tough.
It can be, but it's also very rewarding. I'm proud to serve my country and protect my family.
That's a great attitude to have. What made you want to join the military?
I wanted to do something that would make a difference in the world. I also wanted to be challenged and learn new things.
It sounds like you've found what you were looking for.
I think so! I'm happy with my decision.
That's great to hear. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go camping, fishing, and hiking. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Those all sound like fun activities. I like to go hiking and camping too. I've never been fishing, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I might just have to do that.
You should! I'll go with you if you want.
That would be great! We could make a weekend out of it.
